text: Ani allahace bhaya rakhanaryanna vicarale jate ki tumacya palanakartyane kaya avatarita kele ahe, tevha te uttara detata ki uttamata uttama. Jya lokanni satkarme kelita, tyancyasathi ya jagata bhala'i ahe, ani nihsansaya akhiratace ghara tara phara uttama ahe. Ani kiti cangale ghara ahe, allahace bhaya rakhanaryance
